video_prompt: Anime schoolgirl subtly turns her head and body, her gentle smile broadening slightly. Her hair sways gently. Soft blush deepens on her cheeks. Her hands slowly shift, palms rotating outward. The shadow behind her subtly lengthens and shortens.
image_prompt: Anime schoolgirl, dark brown pigtails, reddish-brown eyes, slight smile. She wears a blue and white activewear jacket and shorts, white socks, and blue and white sneakers. Subtle blush, fair skin. Plain white background, soft lighting, peaceful ambiance. Full body, slightly turned to the side, looking forward.
refined_video_prompt: Her head and body subtly turn. A gentle smile gradually widens, deepening the blush on her cheeks. Her hair sways softly as her hands slowly rotate, palms extending outward. The shadow behind her subtly lengthens and shortens.
